parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description: key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description: offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable. It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description: limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page. If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description: count_total is set to true to indicate that the result set should include a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description: reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: status enables to query for validators matching a given status.

parameters.name: validator_addr
parameters.description: validator_addr defines the validator address to query for.

parameters.name: validator_addr
parameters.description: validator_addr defines the validator address to query for.
